topic: Uncovering the heart of my Nana’s saltwater stories

ideas.title: The Bogan Shark Whisperer
ideas.premise: Nana, dressed in footy shorts and a wifebeater, is calming a great white shark with tales of Collingwood's 1990 premiership.
ideas.why_funny: Juxtaposition of the rough Nana with the dangerous shark, plus Melbourne footy obsession.

ideas.title: Yarra River Mermaid
ideas.premise: A glamorous mermaid emerges from the Yarra, only to be covered in discarded coffee cups and asking for a Chiko Roll.
ideas.why_funny: Satirical take on the Yarra's less-than-pristine reputation. Adds a Melbourne snack reference.

ideas.title: The Brighton Bathing Box Time Machine
ideas.premise: Nana accidentally turns her Brighton Bathing Box into a time machine, transporting her to Federation Square in 1901.
ideas.why_funny: Visual humour of the iconic boxes being used for something ridiculous, historical Melbourne contrast.

ideas.title: St Kilda Pier Penguin Conspiracy
ideas.premise: Nana uncovers a secret society of Little Penguins at St Kilda Pier who are actually running the city's parking meters.
ideas.why_funny: Absurd conspiracy theory combined with adorable penguins and the relatable parking frustration.

ideas.title: Fairy Bread Bait
ideas.premise: Nana using fairy bread as bait to catch a massive snapper off the end of Station Pier.
ideas.why_funny: Using a children's party snack for serious fishing is unexpected and amusing.

ranking: The Brighton Bathing Box Time Machine

headlines.title: Uncovering the heart of my Nana’s saltwater stories
